notes.heading: Definite Integral
notes.summary: Numeric area under curve between limits.

notes.heading: Indefinite Integral
notes.summary: Family of antiderivatives plus constant C.

notes.heading: Mean Value Theorem
notes.summary: If f is cont.[a,b] & diff.(a,b) then ∃c: f'(c)=(f(b)-f(a))/(b-a).

notes.heading: FTC Part I
notes.summary: Derivative of integral returns original integrand.

notes.heading: FTC Part II
notes.summary: Evaluate definite integral using antiderivative F(b)-F(a).

notes.heading: u‑Substitution
notes.summary: Change variable to simplify integrand; integrate in terms of u.

notes.heading: Integration by Parts
notes.summary: ∫u dv = uv - ∫v du, choose u,dv wisely.

notes.heading: Continuity
notes.summary: Function w/out breaks/holes on interval; required in many theorems.

notes.heading: Differentiability
notes.summary: Derivative exists at each point; implies local linearity.

notes.heading: Critical Points
notes.summary: Where f'(x)=0 or undefined; potential extrema.
